question:
Which of the following is / are correct statements about National Crisis Management Committee (NCMC)?
  1. Prime Minister is the chairperson the committee
  2. It monitors the natural disasters occurring in country and conducts the necessary relief and rescue operations
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: <u>First statement is incorrect</u> because the National Crisis Management Committee (NCMC) chaired by the Cabinet secretary. <u>Second statement is correct</u> because National Crisis Management Committee (NCMC) monitors the natural disasters occurring in the country and conducts the necessary relief and rescue operations. The NCMC was recently in news because the committee is carrying out the rescue operations in south India that has been affected by the cyclonic storm named Ockhi.
